body_html: Can you print the list of update_ops that you get? It's possible some of them are actually inside the while_loop and that's creating the problem. If I remember correctly, the batch norm code in contrib handles this by default by not creating any additional update ops. @sguada
body_text: Can you print the list of update_ops that you get?  It's possible some of them are actually inside the while_loop and that's creating the problem.  If I remember correctly, the batch norm code in contrib handles this by default by not creating any additional update ops.  @sguada
body: Can you print the list of update_ops that you get?  It's possible some of them are actually *inside* the while_loop and that's creating the problem.  If I remember correctly, the batch norm code in contrib handles this by default by not creating any additional update ops.  @sguada
